xporter.name: Delta4
xporter.SQLstring: select UID=RTPlan.PlanUID, PatientId=Patient.PatientId, PlanSer=RTPlan.PlanSetupSer, DateTime=PlanSetup.StatusDate from RTPlan, PlanSetup, Course, Patient where RTPlan.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer and PlanSetup.Status='PlanApproval' and PlanSetup.StatusDate>'this.lastActive' and (PlanSetup.PlanSetupId like 'QC%D%4%' or PlanSetup.PlanSetupId like 'QC%d%4%') and Course.CourseSer=PlanSetup.CourseSer and Patient.PatientSer=Course.PatientSer order by PlanSetup.StatusDate

xporter.name: MonteCarlo
xporter.SQLstring: select distinct UID=RTPlan.PlanUID, PatientId=Patient.PatientId, PlanSer=RTPlan.PlanSetupSer, DateTime=PlanSetup.StatusDate from RTPlan, PlanSetup, Course, Patient, Prescription, Radiation, Machine, MLCPlan where RTPlan.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer and PlanSetup.Status='TreatApproval' and PlanSetup.StatusDate>'this.lastActive' and Course.CourseSer=PlanSetup.CourseSer and Patient.PatientSer=Course.PatientSer and PlanSetup.PrescriptionSer=Prescription.PrescriptionSer and Prescription.Status='Approved' and Radiation.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer and Machine.ResourceSer=Radiation.ResourceSer and (Machine.MachineId like 'TB%' or Machine.MachineId like 'IX12') and MLCPlan.RadiationSer=Radiation.RadiationSer and MLCPlan.MLCPlanType like 'Dyn%' order by PlanSetup.StatusDate

xporter.name: XVIL05
xporter.SQLstring: select distinct UID=RTPlan.PlanUID, PatientId=Patient.PatientId, PlanSer=RTPlan.PlanSetupSer, DateTime=PlanSetup.StatusDate from RTPlan, PlanSetup, Course, Patient, Prescription, Radiation, Machine where RTPlan.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer and PlanSetup.Status='TreatApproval' and PlanSetup.StatusDate>'this.lastActive' and Course.CourseSer=PlanSetup.CourseSer and Patient.PatientSer=Course.PatientSer and PlanSetup.PrescriptionSer=Prescription.PrescriptionSer and Prescription.Status='Approved' and Radiation.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer and Machine.ResourceSer=Radiation.ResourceSer and Machine.MachineId='L05' order by PlanSetup.StatusDate

xporter.name: XVIL07
xporter.SQLstring: select distinct UID=RTPlan.PlanUID, PatientId=Patient.PatientId, PlanSer=RTPlan.PlanSetupSer, DateTime=PlanSetup.StatusDate from RTPlan, PlanSetup, Course, Patient, Prescription, Radiation, Machine where RTPlan.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer and PlanSetup.Status='TreatApproval' and PlanSetup.StatusDate>'this.lastActive' and Course.CourseSer=PlanSetup.CourseSer and Patient.PatientSer=Course.PatientSer and PlanSetup.PrescriptionSer=Prescription.PrescriptionSer and Prescription.Status='Approved' and Radiation.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer and Machine.ResourceSer=Radiation.ResourceSer and Machine.MachineId='L07' order by PlanSetup.StatusDate

xporter.name: XVIL09
xporter.SQLstring: select distinct UID=RTPlan.PlanUID, PatientId=Patient.PatientId, PlanSer=RTPlan.PlanSetupSer, DateTime=PlanSetup.StatusDate from RTPlan, PlanSetup, Course, Patient, Prescription, Radiation, Machine where RTPlan.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer and PlanSetup.Status='TreatApproval' and PlanSetup.StatusDate>'this.lastActive' and Course.CourseSer=PlanSetup.CourseSer and Patient.PatientSer=Course.PatientSer and PlanSetup.PrescriptionSer=Prescription.PrescriptionSer and Prescription.Status='Approved' and Radiation.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer and Machine.ResourceSer=Radiation.ResourceSer and Machine.MachineId='L09' order by PlanSetup.StatusDate

xporter.name: iView
xporter.SQLstring: select distinct UID=RTPlan.PlanUID, PatientId=Patient.PatientId, PlanSer=RTPlan.PlanSetupSer, DateTime=PlanSetup.StatusDate from RTPlan, PlanSetup, Course, Patient, Prescription, Radiation, Machine where RTPlan.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer and PlanSetup.Status='TreatApproval' and PlanSetup.StatusDate>'this.lastActive' and Course.CourseSer=PlanSetup.CourseSer and Patient.PatientSer=Course.PatientSer and PlanSetup.PrescriptionSer=Prescription.PrescriptionSer and Prescription.Status='Approved' and Radiation.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer and Machine.ResourceSer=Radiation.ResourceSer and Machine.MachineId like 'L%' order by PlanSetup.StatusDate

xporter.name: Catalyst
xporter.SQLstring: select distinct UID=RTPlan.PlanUID, PatientId=Patient.PatientId, PlanSer=RTPlan.PlanSetupSer, DateTime=PlanSetup.StatusDate from RTPlan, PlanSetup, Course, Patient, Prescription, Radiation where RTPlan.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer and PlanSetup.Status='TreatApproval' and PlanSetup.StatusDate>'this.lastActive' and Course.CourseSer=PlanSetup.CourseSer and Patient.PatientSer=Course.PatientSer and PlanSetup.PrescriptionSer=Prescription.PrescriptionSer and Prescription.Status='Approved' and Radiation.PlanSetupSer=PlanSetup.PlanSetupSer order by PlanSetup.StatusDate
